name: Chronicle Collection Scented Candle – Rose Fumée
description: Allow yourself to be seduced by this smoky, intoxicating scent, whose floral and woody notes have found equilibrium, working together to transport you to a secret garden at dusk. Enticing and musky, it can't help but evoke notions of romance. Made by the world's oldest active candle manufacturer, Cire Trudon, it is crafted using meticulous production techniques and zero artificial ingredients to ensure a clean, smoke-free burn. Scent includes notes of sandalwood, rose and smoked birch.
